definition: Saigon, capital of former South Vietnam/Sai Kung town in New Territories, Hong Kong
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The Project site is located on the western shore of Pak Sha Wan, Sai Kung.
sentences.chinese: 工程项目的地点位于西贡白沙湾的西岸。

sentences.english: Give Saigon a day or so.
sentences.chinese: 再给西贡一两天的时间吧。

sentences.english: Reconstruction of the existing Wong Shek Public Pier, which is partly within Sai Kung East Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 重建部分位于西贡东郊野公园内的黄石公众码头。

sentences.english: At the pier in Sai Kung town, a floating seafood market operates in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在西贡镇的码头，流动的海鲜市场在下午开始营业。

sentences.english: He doesn't think much about his past life as a beggar in the streets of Saigon.
sentences.chinese: 他不多想过去在西贡街上要饭的生活。

sentences.english: Loan shot the man in the head in broad daylight on the street in Saigon.
sentences.chinese: 楼在光天化日的西贡大街上朝那人头部开枪。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works wholly in Sai Kung East Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 于西贡东郊野公园内进行土木工事及建筑工程。

sentences.english: The Saigon Postoffice near the church is always full of tourists.
sentences.chinese: 教堂附近的西贡邮局里面总是熙熙攘攘。

sentences.english: The Centre is situated on the east of Hiram's Highway near Sai Kung Town.
sentences.chinese: 狮子会自然教育中心位于西贡公路东面，邻近西贡墟。

sentences.english: The Centre is situated on the east of Hiram's Highway near Sai Kung Town.
sentences.chinese: 狮子会自然教育中心位于西贡公路东面，邻近西贡墟。

sentences.english: And Phnom Penh to Angkor, Saigon to Honai.
sentences.chinese: 金边到吴哥，西贡到河内。

sentences.english: It's right here in the Sai Kung West Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 就是这里，西贡郊野公园。

sentences.english: Today, we'll visit Sai Kung District in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天来到了香港的西贡区。

sentences.english: And so to hot, humid Saigon itself, a place that manages to be modern and moribund at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 在西贡这个又热又潮湿的地方，现代与破败共存。

sentences.english: From New York to Saigon, here are the can't-miss options.
sentences.chinese: 从纽约到西贡，这里是不容错过的选择。

sentences.english: Several relaxed cafés and coffee shops are housed within the Saigon Centre with Sedona Suites.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡馆和咖啡店被安置在塞多纳酒店西贡中心。

definition: Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam

pinyin: Mei2 gong1 he2 san1 jiao3 zhou1

definition: Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Ho Chi Minh (1890-1969), former Vietnamese leader/see also 胡志明市[Hu2 Zhi4 ming2 Shi4]
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Sabah, state of Malaysia in north Borneo 婆羅洲|婆罗洲
Sham Shui Po district of Kowloon, Hong Kong
